backend/main.mo: Motoko actor implementing a job management system for a pencil sketch pipeline, with endpoints to create, process, retry, and query jobs, including rate limiting, expiry cleanup, and stage tracking using blob storage.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing three features: optimizing the pencil sketch pipeline in pencilSketchUtils.ts, updating GalleryView for progressive 5-stage display, and fixing Results.tsx to suppress raw error messages.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing short summaries of all frontend source files, describing the purpose and recent changes of each component, page, hook, and utility in the project.
frontend/index.css: Base Tailwind CSS entry file defining OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light and dark themes, covering background, foreground, card, border, chart, and sidebar color tokens.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point for the Vite/React app, setting the page title to 'HILSA-ART GUIDE' and mounting the React root via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that configures TanStack Router with four routes (Home, HowItWorks, Contact, Results), wraps the app in ThemeProvider and a shared Header/Footer layout, and adds Sonner toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Site footer component rendering the HILSA-ART brand, navigation links, social media icons (Instagram, X, Behance), a copyright year, and a caffeine.ai attribution link.
frontend/src/components/GalleryView.tsx: Displays a 5-stage pencil sketch gallery for an uploaded portrait, using either backend-provided stage images or client-side canvas generation with progressive updates, lightbox navigation, and download support.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Renders a fixed site header with logo, desktop navigation links, a CTA button, and a collapsible mobile menu using TanStack Router for active link detection.
Provides a drag-and-drop/file-input image upload UI that validates the file, creates a backend job via mutations, tracks upload progress, and navigates to the results page on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an ICP backend actor (authenticated or anonymous) using TanStack Query, and invalidates dependent queries whenever the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity authentication context provider and hook, managing AuthClient lifecycle, login/logout flow, delegation validity checks, and exposing identity state to the React tree.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines TanStack Query hooks for fetching a single job (with polling), listing user jobs, creating a job, processing a job, and retrying a failed job against the ICP backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file that imports Google Fonts (Playfair Display, Inter, Cormorant Garamond), sets up Tailwind directives, and defines light/dark theme CSS custom properties for a cream/parchment editorial design system with gold accents.
frontend/src/lib/pencilSketchUtils.ts: Client-side image processing utility that converts a photo into a 5-stage pencil sketch using canvas operations, including grayscale conversion, Sobel edge detection, separable Gaussian blur, and hatching/shading compositing.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React app entry point that mounts the app with QueryClientProvider, InternetIdentityProvider, and renders the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/Contact.tsx: Contact page with a validated contact form (name, email, message) that simulates submission with a toast notification, alongside contact info and social media links.
frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx: Home page featuring a hero section with a scroll-to-upload CTA, a 5-stage sketch progression display with images, and an embedded UploadInterface component.
frontend/src/pages/HowItWorks.tsx: Informational page describing the 5-stage pencil sketch pipeline (hatching, directional strokes, cross-hatching, graphite shading, final artwork) with icons, descriptions, and technical detail for each stage.
frontend/src/pages/Results.tsx: Results page that fetches a sketch job by ID from the URL params and renders loading, error, failed, or success states. On success, displays the uploaded image and sketch stages via the GalleryView component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the default theme with custom fonts (Playfair Display, Cormorant Garamond, Inter), OKLCH-based color tokens (gold, ink, sidebar, chart, etc.), custom shadows, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state manifest describing the photo-to-pencil-sketch app's architecture, existing implemented features (pipeline optimization, gallery view, Results page error suppression), and pending feature requests (upload, sketch generation, gallery display, download).
